This project uses data from [American Forests](https://www.americanforests.org/) and explores 
the correlation between certain health metrics and tree cover in a given census tract.  

![Negative correlation between tree cover and asthma](asthma.png)  

Graphs were made with plotly in Python, and the bivariate maps were created in ArcGIS Pro. [Click here to see the full data exploration.](https://freestok.herokuapp.com/scrolly-map/)
